Description: This guitar is a bit of a rarity, it's the ec401b baritone 6, with a 27 inch scale and a mahogany body this guitar sounds beautiful and brutal, it can handle some serious downtuning, right now it's in drop A with ernie ball cobalt 7 string set minus the high E(i will include the 2 extra sets) it has aftermarket keystone tuning pegs for more of a les paul look, and currently has an emg 66 in brushed black chrome finish in the neck, i was just experimenting with clean tones, i still have the original emg 60 that was in it, which i will include, they are extremely easy to change as they are solderless and simply plug in. This guitar is super clean aside from typical belt rash on the back and a little ding on the back of the headstock that is pictured. I only used it for some studio work a couple years ago and have hardly played it since, i just need seven strings now for my current project and need to sell this one to get another 7 string. It really is a beuaty and hate to let it go, but it's not getting any use here. I will ship it in the original ESP box it came to me in, have to keep my hardshell, sorry, but will be double boxed and secured with love.
Title: Esp Ltd Ec-401B baritone 6 string EXCELLENT condition with mods
